arts.ttl: Tottenham Hotspur vs Villarreal – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Champions League football returns to the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium on Tuesday as Spurs host Villarreal in their opening group stage match. The fixture presents a fascinating clash of historical records. Tottenham have a dreadful record against Spanish opposition, with just one win in their last 13 European games. arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur mark their return to the Champions League on Tuesday, a reward for their triumphant Europa League campaign last season. That European success, which ended a 17-year trophy drought, came in stark contrast to their domestic form, where the club finished a dismal 17th in the Premier League. arts.ttl: Thomas Partey could play for Villarreal at Tottenham on eve of court hearing
arts.sum: Partey due in court on Wednesday to answer rape charges Villarreal manager says midfielder is ‘prepared to play’ Thomas Partey is scheduled to appear at Southwark crown court on Wednesday morning to answer rape charges – after his new club, Villarreal, kick off their Champions League campaign at Tottenham on Tuesday night. It is an extraordinary situation with Partey, who spent five years at Arsenal before joining Villarreal in August on a free transfer, guaranteed a hot reception at Spurs’ stadium.
